overview:
Matthew Krueger is Vice President, Corporate Marketing and Development with Network Equipment Technologies (NET)

Matt brings more than 15 years of technology industry experience, having worked early stage/public technology companies since 1995. Matt has extensive experience with strategic partnering, international business expansion and management from both the corporate and venture capital perspectives. Matt joined NET in 2005 as Director of Channel Development, working to develop the Company’s partner roadmap and strategy. Currently, he is head of Corporate Marketing and Business Development, including investor relations, corporate communications, Web 2.0 strategy, developing and managing strategic relationships, mergers, and acquisitions.

Previously, Matt was Vice President of Business Development for Waterfield Technologies, delivering a portfolio of pre-built, private label applications and development services for the financial services market. Prior to Waterfield, Matt was with Edify Corporation where he held several management positions from pre-IPO to acquisition by S1 Corporation, including World-Wide Product Marketing and Manager of World-Wide Channel Sales.

Matt holds a BA in Communications from Saint Maryâ€™s College of California.
